item.description:
Happy Holidays from Urban League's Young Professionals!! We invite you join us for our joint Holiday Mixer!! Heavy Hors D'oeurves Drink Specials

'Tis the season for giving
During the holiday mixer, we will be accepting donations for Toys for Tots. Bring an unwrapped toy to our holiday mixer on December 13th to donate.

 

If you're unable to donate at the holiday mixer, the Wilson-Gray YMCA at 444 Albany Avenue in Hartford will be accepting gifts for their annual party now through December 13th.

 

The YMCA also welcomes YP members to help wrap gifts on December 15th and volunteer to distribute gifts at their holiday party on December 18th.
item.name: Holiday Mixer And Toy Drive
